I kind don't feel sorry for the guy in this story too tell the truth I mean he did see what was going on and he still decided to give her a chance and got what he deserved. That said if he had not given her a chance some of you would say he didn't do anything so he's a cucked loser, but for me if he had done something earlier then maybe he would've gotten my sympathy.

There is a reason why i Like NTR which can't be done in real life or can be done if done right which are 1) The Boy's Love interest is always Naive and scared of what will the boy will say if he ever saw it, 2) Boy is dense as a brick wall until it crashes into his face like a wrecking ball and regret it not noticing it in the end, 3) NTR make the greatest Eroge RPG game element, 4) NTR is the most diverse genre in all doujin cause there is also a reverse NTR where the one being NTR'ed is the boy from the girl(basically the boy is being stolen from the girl) that translates to the tag cheating.. well those are some of my reason cause if said it all then this comment will turn into an essay.
